Congratulations Class of 2012!

This year, 93 members of the Achieving Independence Center (AIC) graduated high school!  Many of these scholars have already been accepted to colleges and are preparing to begin in the Fall.
Learn More

    Latest Happenings

    Congratulations Class of 2012!

    June 20, 2012 • Shaun M • Comments Off

    This year, 93 members of the Achieving Independence Center (AIC) graduated high school!  Many of these scholars have already been accepted to colleges and are preparing to begin in the Fall.  We could use your help.

    In AIC, Education, Supportive Housing • Tagged news, youth focus
